author: Thomas Avent
comment: Since my friends and I get hungry often, pizza is always on the menu. At any time, I can bring up this app and find the nearest pizzaria, wherever I can get cell and GPS service!
title: A great functioning novilty app!

author: Nick Hernandez
comment: Was planning on buying pizza for my wife's graduation party from a pre determined place when we found out day of that they were closed. Fired up this app on my Moto 360 and found the closest pizza place. Ended up buying from them and the pizza was great! Thanks, Pizza Navigator for saving my wife's grad party!
title: Amazing!

author: Arthur Lee
comment: Looks good and can find most of the pizza places, what is the databse for this and how can we add more?  Edit: Would be good to advertise that it goes off Google API.  I would also suggest you use foursquare API

reply.author: JiaCorp
reply.content: It doesn't store places. It gets the places from google maps API. If it doesn't show in google maps, it won't show in this app.

title: how to add new places?

author: Gonzalo Barril
comment: I don't know how I lived before this app. EDIT: Kms were available I was an idiot, thanks for the fastest reply!

reply.author: JiaCorp
reply.content:
Yep! Already there. Tap on the distance (on the phone) to toggle between the different metric systems. Restart the app on the watch to see the new settings.

EDIT: Thanks for your support!

title: Beautiful

author: Ben Myers
comment: I bought this mostly for the novelty of a pizza thing on my watch, pointing me to pizza, but the app isn't showing up on my LG watch. What's the deal?

reply.author: JiaCorp
reply.content:
Is this issue still happening? I uninstalled and reinstalled the app on my phone, and it showed up right away on my moto 360 watch. Have you tried restarting your watch, or try reinstalling the app? 

I'll look more into it if it's still happening to you. Thanks

title: Won't appear on Android Watch

author: anton vinogradov
comment: Simple app, does what it says, implemented my suggestion of blacklisting certain pizza places. love it

reply.author: JiaCorp
reply.content: I will add the feature to "dislike" a place, and by doing so, it will never come up. This will be in the next release.

title: Good stuff

author: Ian Tilley
comment: To be honest, when I bought this I wasn't expecting it to work in my little back corner of Istanbul. However, it works perfectly... It located all the places I thought it would miss.
title: Wow

author: Julien Duplant
comment: This app finds pizza, isn't that great?!?!?
title: FINDS PIZZA

author: Vimukthi Mawilmada
comment: I was standing in front of pizza hut but it navigated to a dominions 1 km away now it navigated to subway.
title: Navigation sucks

author: Adam Netzer
comment: ...which i plan to take advantage of once the 'wedding diet' is no longer in effect.
title: Funny little app...

comment: Really cool app comes in handy when you need to find a pizzeria fast
title: Coooooool

comment: This is great, just wish there was more pizza near my school... Upgraded to five starts after addition of metric and navigation
title: Very neat

author: Gibson Goldsmith
comment: I would be totally sold on this app if you guys ever created an app for Pebble too. Nice work!
title: Pebble integration?

author: Owen TJ Walter
comment: it is amazing :)
title: I love this app 🍕

author: Trevor Fitzgerald
comment: We have reached a time in the history of the world that can progress no further. This app is proof. Truly elegant design, functional UI, and most importantly, pizza nearby. I would not hesitate for a second to buy this app.
title: Finally

author: Dennis Drabinski
comment: Great work. Funny little thing but like others have said, metric units would be great for people pretty much everywhere. 😉

reply.author: JiaCorp
reply.content: The features you requested are now live

title: Novel little app. Love it.

author: Kurt Hsiung
comment: The best thing that could ever happen in my life!
title: Good

comment: Works and looks great. I'd love to see metric units, though. Or, are units tied to system language?

reply.author: JiaCorp
reply.content: The features you requested are now live

comment: Possibly the best thing I've ever spent one dollar on. Thank you for this.

comment: Absolute genius

author: Maggie Y. Lei
comment: I can't wait to use it when I visit NY. Love the pizza places in Brooklyn!
title: Love it!

author: James Cole
comment: A lot of the business names get truncated for me on the 360 though... Maybe a marquee would work.

reply.author: JiaCorp
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback. App updated.

title: Great fun!

author: Paolo De Los Reyes
comment: This app is hilarious. Totally unnecessary and way cool. Just tried it at work and it pointed to the pizza spot down the road. I think a good test would be in Manhattan.
title: Haha Hilarious!

author: Jason G
comment: Amazing! I had no idea there was pizza right around the corner, I found it with such ease using this pizza compass!
title: Pizza!!!

comment: Awesome, simple app to get your pizza fix!
title: Genius
